name: Lost Riches
description:
Lost Riches is a third-person puzzle platformer inspired by the game "Captain Toad: Treasure Tracker".

Our mission is to recover the treasure that has been stolen from Jerry, a piggy bank. To do this we will have to go after the thief through the different levels and collect all the possible loot along our journey.

This demo is my final year project in art school, so I decided to make a small playable level since I was excited to continue learning Unreal Engine.

All assets are made by me, except the sounds and some materials.

Made in Unreal Engine 4.

I hope you like it!

Artstation: artstation.com/manuelortega
